Title: Five Cycles at Pebbles
Description:
[b]Can you survive?[/b]

[hr]

[h1]FIVE CYCLES AT PEBBLES[/h1]

A Five Nights At Freddy's-inspired gamemode! Play as The Nightguard, a purposed soul trapped in an abandoned ancient pizzeria by your manager, Five Pebbles, relentlessly hunted down by evil slugcat animatronics!

Features basic translations for all languages that Rain World supports! [i](via online translator, refined by people. Let me know if you would like to help with proofreading the translations!)[/i]

[h2]CONTROLS[/h2]

[h3]In-Camera:[/h3]
[list]
[*]MOVEMENT to navigate between cameras
[*]JUMP to select the camera
[*]GRAB to exit the camera
[/list]
[h3]Out of Camera:[/h3]
[*]If standing near the edges of the room, GRAB to turn on light and THROW to toggle door
[*]If standing in the middle, GRAB to open cameras and THROW to tell Five Pebbles to shut up.

[/list]
